title: What is JavaScript?
content: It is a “scripting” language, nothing to do with Java (java is all purpose lang).It is interpreted language, scripts are executed without compilation.Usually embedded in HTML pages & add interactivity to HTML pages.It will be executed immediately while the page loads into your browser. (sometimes, it is not what we want; we may want to execute when user trigger it or when the page loads)JavaScript is case sensitive. (same as Java)
